playwright.description: Playwright MCP server for automated browser testing of VEFS website

notes: Playwright MCP server allows Claude to:
1. Navigate to pages and verify CSS/JS loading
2. Take screenshots for visual verification
3. Test responsive design across viewports
4. Verify accessibility (WCAG AA compliance)
5. Test form validation and interactions
6. Check for console errors
7. Verify navigation and links work correctly
8. Test dynamic content loading (when using local server)
Usage Instructions for Claude:
- Use Playwright MCP to test any bug fixes before marking as complete
- Take screenshots to verify visual changes
- Check browser console for JavaScript errors
- Verify responsive design on mobile (375px) and desktop (1920px) viewports
- Test all navigation links work correctly
- Verify forms have proper validation
For testing with local server:
Start server first: python -m http.server 8000 (from VEFS-website folder)
Then update baseUrl to: http://localhost:8000
For testing static files (current setup):
Use file:// protocol URLs (already configured above)
